Run alsamixer first, and see if there are channels muted or turned down. And see if the correct audio device is quoted in upper left.
cat /dev/urandom > /dev/dsp   #See if you get errors or if you hear the noise, (Ctrl-c to stop it)
CHeck to see if the speakers are plugged into correct port, or just switch ports and see if you get sound from another.
Do you have external switch or volume control?
